mapper.sql: Orders_Auto, Inc_Auto, TradeItem_Auto, CarBase_Auto, Sales_Auto, CustSource, CustMemo, CarSource, FactoryBrand_Auto, Brand_Auto, Clasen_Auto, ClasenCode, CarColor, CarDT, CC, MakNo, ListPrice, DisPrice, GetPrice, Accessary, PushMoney, PushMan, PushMan_Auto, PushTEL, CarTax, CarCost, OverAmt, DptAmt, MakNoType, MakNoCost, OrderType, MM, RentAmt, RentType, StampTax, SellCarTax, TrnsFee, PayMode, PayDay, InsureType, InsurePercnt, Percnt, CarPlace, RateRate, FinalRate, RateMCost, RateYCost, RateTCost, RateM, RateY, RateT, RateCost, RateDPN, RateTax, RateAmt, FinalMCost, FinalYCost, FinalTCost, FinalM, FinalY, FinalT, FinalCost, FinalDPN, FinalTax, FinalAmt, MAmt, RentAmtT, RentRate, GrossMargin, GrossMarginT, OrderStatus, Memo, TaxMode, TaxRate, chkListPrice, CUser, CDT, MUser, MDT, LinceKM, AppDate, A1, A2, A3, A4, A5, Orders_Old, PostType, ISContractLock, LockUser, LockDT, ISThirdParty, BsType, NoInsure, IRR, NPV, IsCredit, IsCreditUser, DptType, Supplier_Buy, Project_Auto, Onetime, RepurchaseAmt, ISInsureOffer, CostAdjustment, DptTaxPay, DptTax, oil, IsCustomerCare, ReletMakno, IsRelet, OnetimeTransfer, OnetimePoundage, OverAmt_Y, Budget01_Y, CarTransfer, MakNo_INC, Weight, MM2, UseKM, ServiceAmt, OutFee, FinanceFee, UrgentFee, MortgageAddr, CommissionRate, RateTaxY, A6, A7, InsureAnomalyType, CarPriceRef, IsBigTradeItem, CarExtensionAmt, Discount
mapper.select:
declare @User_Auto Int, @Roles Int
set @User_Auto = #{userAuto} set @Roles = #{rolesAuto}
Begin Declare @Seq Int Select @Seq=isnull(seq,0) From ItemCode Where ItemType=1062 And Num=@Roles
select a.Orders_Auto into #C from Orders a where a.orderstatus > 0 and a.orderstatus < 20 and ( @Roles in(11,30,145) or a.Sales_Auto in ( Select a.User_Auto from AspNet.dbo.aspnet_Users a Join AspNet.dbo.EmpBase b on a.UserName=b.UserName Where Org_Auto in (select a.org_auto from AspNet.dbo.org2EMP a Where a.User_Auto=@User_AUTO and AclType=0) ))
Select distinct a.Orders_Auto,a.OrderType,a.Sales_Auto, n.ItemName AS orderStatusName,b.FName salesname,c.SName,b.DepName, p.Memo nowplace,case when a.Onetime = 1 then '是' else '' end onetimeName ,case when k.MaxLevel <= @Seq then 1 else 0 end auditOK From #C left join Orders(nolock) a on a.Orders_Auto = #C.Orders_Auto left join workflowdoc(nolock) k0 on a.orders_Auto=k0.DocPostID And k0.Memo='999' and k0.Status = 0 and k0.AppSeq <= 0 and k0.levnow = k0.AppSeq inner Join workflowdoc(nolock) k on a.orders_Auto=k.DocPostID And k.Memo='999' and k.Status = 0 and ((k0.AppSeq is not null and k0.AppSeq = k.AppSeq) or (k0.AppSeq is null and k.AppSeq = k.LevNow +1)) Left join v_Emp b on a.Sales_Auto=b.User_Auto Left Join customer(nolock) f on a.TradeItem_Auto=f.TradeItem_Auto LEFT join TradeItem(nolock) c On c.TradeItem_Auto=f.TradeItem_Auto Left Join Brand cc on a.Brand_Auto=cc.Brand_Auto Left Join Clasen dd on dd.Clasen_Auto=a.Clasen_Auto Left Join itemcode p on k.roleid=p.num And p.itemtype=1062 Left join Itemcode n on a.OrderStatus = n.Num and n.ItemType = 327 Where k.RoleID = @Roles Order By a.Orders_Auto Desc
drop table #C End

select a.TaxRate,a.RateRate,a.RateCost,a.RateDPN,a.RateAmt,a.RateTax, a.MAmt,a.RentRate,a.ServiceAmt, a.FinalRate,a.FinalCost,a.FinalDPN,a.FinalAmt,a.FinalTax, a.Orders_Auto,a.Orders_Old,a.MM,a.isRelet, o.ItemName AS dptTypeName,a.PostType,
convert(varchar(10),convert(decimal(18,2),((cast(a.DptAmt as decimal) *100/cast(a.CarCost as decimal)))))+'%' as dptP, case when p.ItemName is null then '' else ' : ' + p.ItemName end dptTaxPayN, m.ItemName AS postTypeName,n.ItemName AS orderStatusName, a.RentType, e.ItemName AS rentTypeName,f.ItemName AS orderTypeName, a.TradeItem_Auto,c.FName AS fName,b.FName AS salesname, g.ItemName AS custSourceName, a.PushMan,a.PushTEL,supplierBuyName = Supplier_Buy.FName, a.CarDT, l.FactoryBrandName,j.BrandName,k.ClasenName, a.CarColor,h.ItemName AS carSourceName,a.CarSource, a.ClasenCode,a.CC,i.ItemName AS oilName, r.ItemName AS bsTypeName,a.MakNo,a.CarBase_Auto, a.ReletMakno,d.FName AS carIncName,q.ItemName AS makNoTypeName, a.MakNoCost,a.ListPrice,a.DisPrice,a.GetPrice,a.CarPriceRef, a.Accessary,a.CarTax,a.CarCost,a.PushMoney,a.OverAmt_Y, a.DptAmt,a.OverAmt,a.RentAmt,a.CostAdjustment,isnull(a.RepurchaseAmt,0) AS repurchaseAmt, a.DptTax,a.CarExtensionAmt,a.OutFee,a.FinanceFee,a.UrgentFee, a.StampTax,a.SellCarTax,a.TrnsFee,a.PayMode,a.PayDay, a.RentAmtT,a.GrossMargin,a.Memo, convert(varchar(10),convert(decimal(18,2),(a.IRR)))+'%' as irr, convert(varchar(10),convert(decimal(18,2),(a.GrossMarginT)))+'%' as grossMarginT, isnull(a.A1,'') AS a1,isnull(a.A2,'') AS a2,isnull(a.A3,'') AS a3,isnull(a.A4,'') AS a4,isnull(a.A5,'') AS a5, s.ItemName AS insureTypeName,t.ItemName As insurePercntName, a.Percnt,u.ItemName as carPlace,v.ItemName customerCareName,a.isCustomerCare, a.Budget01_Y,a.Onetime,isnull(a.A6,'') AS a6,isnull(a.A7,'') AS a7, isnull(w.Project_Name,'') as projectName, isBigTra=case when a.IsBigTradeItem =1 then '（大口客户）' when a.IsBigTradeItem =0 then '' else '' end ,isnull([dbo].[f_CustomerStatus](a.TradeItem_Auto),'') customerStatus from Orders a left join v_Emp b on a.Sales_Auto = b.User_Auto left join TradeItem(nolock) c On a.TradeItem_Auto = c.TradeItem_Auto left join Inc d on a.Inc_Auto = d.Inc_Auto left join Itemcode e on a.RentType = e.Num and e.ItemType = 314 left join Itemcode f on a.OrderType = f.Num and f.ItemType = 326 left join Itemcode g on a.CustSource = g.Num and g.ItemType = 313 left join Itemcode h on a.CarSource = h.Num and h.ItemType = 503 left join Itemcode i on a.oil = i.Num and i.ItemType = 231 left join FactoryBrand l on a.FactoryBrand_Auto = l.FactoryBrand_Auto left join Brand j on a.Brand_Auto = j.Brand_Auto left join Clasen k on a.Clasen_Auto = k.Clasen_Auto left join Itemcode m on a.PostType = m.Num and m.ItemType = 413 left join Itemcode n on a.OrderStatus = n.Num and n.ItemType = 327 left join TradeItem Supplier_Buy (nolock) on a.Supplier_Buy=Supplier_Buy.TradeItem_Auto left join Itemcode o on a.DptType = o.Num and o.ItemType = 332 left join ItemCode p on p.ItemType = 333 and p.Num = a.DptTaxPay left join ItemCode q on q.ItemType = 412 and q.Num = a.MakNoType left join ItemCode r on r.ItemType = 841 and r.Num = a.BsType left join Itemcode s on a.InsureType = s.Num and s.ItemType = 411 left join Itemcode t on a.InsurePercnt = t.Num and t.ItemType = 410 left join ItemCode u on u.itemtype = 227 and u.num = a.CarPlace left join ItemCode v on v.ItemType = 128 and v.Num = a.ISCustomerCare left join Orders_Project w on w.Project_Auto = a.Project_Auto where a.Orders_Auto = #{params}

select distinct a.Order_Auto,b.Orders_Auto, c.FactoryBrandName+'-'+e.BrandName brandName, g.ClasenName,convert(decimal(18,0),b.ListPrice) ListPrice, f.fname supplierName,h.enddt bookDT, d.fname salesName,isnull(h.enddt,a.CDT) endDt from orders b left join [order] a on a.Orders_Auto = b.Orders_Auto left join v_emp d on a.Sales_Auto=d.User_Auto left Join TradeItem f on b.Supplier_Buy = f.TradeItem_Auto left join FactoryBrand c on c.FactoryBrand_Auto = b.FactoryBrand_Auto left join Brand e on e.Brand_Auto = b.Brand_Auto left join Clasen g on g.Clasen_Auto = b.Clasen_Auto left join Credit_Order i on i.Orders_Auto = b.Orders_Auto left join BookCar h on h.CreditMain_Auto = i.CreditMain_Auto where b.Supplier_Buy=(select Supplier_Buy from orders where Orders_Auto=#{params} ) and (datediff(m,h.EndDT,getdate())<=6 or datediff(m,a.CDT,getdate())<=6) order By isnull(h.enddt,a.CDT) desc

select p.ItemName AS postTypeName, (select isnull(convert(decimal(18,0),(sum(FeeAmt))),0) from OrdersFee where Orders_Auto=#{params} and FeeType_Auto not in(2,16)) feeAmt, (select isnull(convert(decimal(18,0),(sum(FeeAmt))),0) from OrdersFee where Orders_Auto=#{params} and FeeType_Auto in(2)) gpsAmt, (select isnull(convert(decimal(18,0),(sum(InsureRealAmt))),0) from OrdersInsureList where Orders_Auto = #{params}) insureRealAmt, a.Orders_Auto,a.Orders_Old,a.MM, a.TradeItem_Auto,c.FName AS fName,b.FName AS salesname, g.ItemName AS custSourceName, a.PushMan,isnull(a.PushTEL,'') AS pushTel,supplierBuyName = Supplier_Buy.FName, a.CarDT, l.FactoryBrandName,j.BrandName,k.ClasenName, a.CarColor,h.ItemName AS carSourceName, a.ClasenCode,a.CC,i.ItemName AS oilName, r.ItemName AS bsTypeName,a.MakNo,d.FName AS carIncName, convert(decimal(18,0),(a.ListPrice)) as ListPrice, convert(decimal(18,0),(a.DisPrice)) as DisPrice, convert(decimal(18,0),(a.GetPrice)) as GetPrice, isnull(a.CarPriceRef,0) CarPriceRef, convert(decimal(18,0),(a.Accessary)) as Accessary, a.CarTax,a.PushMoney, convert(decimal(18,0),(a.DptAmt)) as DptAmt,a.RentAmt, a.CarExtensionAmt,a.OutFee,a.FinanceFee,a.UrgentFee, a.StampTax,a.PayMode,a.PayDay, a.RentAmtT,a.GrossMargin,a.Memo, convert(varchar(10),convert(decimal(18,2),(a.IRR)))+'%' as irr, convert(varchar(10),convert(decimal(18,2),(a.GrossMarginT)))+'%' as grossMarginT, isnull(a.A1,'') AS a1,isnull(a.A2,'') AS a2,isnull(a.A3,'') AS a3,isnull(a.A4,'') AS a4,isnull(a.A5,'') AS a5, o.ItemName AS mortgageAddrN, a.MM2,a.UseKM,a.Weight, m.ItemName AS insureTypeName,n.ItemName As insurePercntName, a.Percnt,isnull(convert(decimal(18,0),a.Discount),0) as Discount, q.ItemName as carPlace, convert(varchar(10),convert(decimal(18,2),(a.RateTaxY)))+'%' as rateTaxY, a.TaxMode, convert(varchar(10),convert(decimal(18,2),(a.RateRate)))+'%' as rateRate, a.TaxRate AS salesTax, a.rentRate, convert(varchar(10),convert(decimal(18,2),(a.rentRate)))+'%' as rentRateN, convert(decimal(18,2),(a.FinalTax)) as finalTax, isBigTra=case when a.IsBigTradeItem =1 then '（大口客户）' when a.IsBigTradeItem =0 then '' else '' end,f.ItemName AS orderTypeName, convert(varchar(10),convert(decimal(18,2),(a.commissionRate)))+'%' as commissionRate, a.MAmt AS rentMAmt ,isnull([dbo].[f_CustomerStatus](a.TradeItem_Auto),'') customerStatus from Orders a left join v_Emp b on a.Sales_Auto = b.User_Auto left join TradeItem(nolock) c On a.TradeItem_Auto = c.TradeItem_Auto left join Inc d on a.Inc_Auto = d.Inc_Auto left join Itemcode g on a.CustSource = g.Num and g.ItemType = 313 left join Itemcode h on a.CarSource = h.Num and h.ItemType = 503 left join Itemcode i on a.oil = i.Num and i.ItemType = 231 left join FactoryBrand l on a.FactoryBrand_Auto = l.FactoryBrand_Auto left join Brand j on a.Brand_Auto = j.Brand_Auto left join Clasen k on a.Clasen_Auto = k.Clasen_Auto left join TradeItem Supplier_Buy (nolock) on a.Supplier_Buy=Supplier_Buy.TradeItem_Auto left join ItemCode r on r.ItemType = 841 and r.Num = a.BsType left join Itemcode m on a.InsureType = m.Num and m.ItemType = 411 left join Itemcode n on a.InsurePercnt = n.Num and n.ItemType = 410 left join ItemCode o on o.itemtype = 135 and o.num = a.MortgageAddr left join Itemcode f on a.OrderType = f.Num and f.ItemType = 326 left join Itemcode p on a.PostType = p.Num and p.ItemType = 413 left join ItemCode q on q.itemtype = 227 and q.num = a.CarPlace where a.Orders_Auto = #{params}

declare @Orders_Auto int set @Orders_Auto = #{params} Declare @ServiceCost_ int,@ServiceCost int,@CarTax_ Decimal(10,2),@CarTax Decimal(10,2) Declare @ListPrice Decimal(10,2),@OverAmt Decimal(10,2),@MM int,@TaxMode int,@chkListPrice int,@MSG NVARCHAR(500), @PushMoney_ Decimal(10,2),@PushMoney Decimal(10,2),@OverP_ Decimal(10,2),@OverP Decimal(10,2),@Orders_Old bigint,@OrderStatus int, @CC int,@CDT datetime,@Tax Decimal(16,2)
Select @MSG=''
select @ListPrice =ListPrice,@OverAmt=OverAmt,@MM=MM,@CarTax=CarTax,@TaxMode =TaxMode,@chkListPrice =chkListPrice,@Orders_Old=Orders_Old,@CC = CC,@CDT=CDT,@Tax = b.V1 from [Orders] a (nolock) left join ItemCode b on b.ItemType = 2014 and b.num =a.TaxMode where orders_auto=@Orders_Auto
if (@CC <= 1600 and year(@CDT) < 2017) BEGIN SELECT @MSG=@MSG+'从2015年10月1日到2016年12月31日,对购买1.6升及以下排量乘用车实施减半征收车辆购置税的优惠政策！' END
if @Orders_Old > 0 BEGIN select @OrderStatus=isnull(OrderStatus,0) from [Orders] (nolock) where orders_auto=@Orders_Old
SELECT @MSG=CASE When @OrderStatus=30 then '原单授信已核准 ' When @OrderStatus=50 then '原单已转申购 ' ELSE '' End END
if @chkListPrice=0 And @TaxMode=3 BEGIN SELECT @MSG=@MSG+'购车发票不能抵扣 ' END
if ((@CC > 1600 and @CarTax < Round(@ListPrice/11.3,0)) or (@CC <= 1600 and year(@CDT) < 2017 and @CarTax < Round(@ListPrice/(1+@Tax)*0.05,0))) BEGIN SELECT @MSG=@MSG+' 购置税必需大于' + convert(varchar(20), convert(decimal(18,2), case when @CC > 1600 then Round(@ListPrice/11.3,0) else Round(@ListPrice/(1+@Tax)*0.05,0) end)) END
Select @ServiceCost_=isNULL(A1,0) FROM ItemCode (nolock) Where ItemType=328 And @ListPrice between V1 And V2
select @ServiceCost=PA from [OrdersBudget] (nolock) where orders_auto=@Orders_Auto And Type_auto=4
if @ServiceCost < @ServiceCost_ BEGIN SELECT @MSG=@MSG+' 服务费标准为' +Convert(NVARCHAR(20),@ServiceCost_) END
Select @MM=Case When @MM <=12 Then 12 When @MM <=24 Then 24 else 36 End
Select @OverP_=Case When @MM <=12 Then .5 When @MM <=24 Then .4 else .3 End if @OverAmt=0 BEGIN SELECT @MSG=@MSG+' 残值标准为' +Convert(NVARCHAR(20),@OverP_*100)+'%' END ELSE BEGIN if @ListPrice/@OverAmt>@OverP_ BEGIN SELECT @MSG=@MSG+' 残值标准为' +Convert(NVARCHAR(20),@OverP_*100)+'%' END END
Select @PushMoney_=isNull( A1,0) FROM ItemCode (nolock) Where ItemType = 330 And @ListPrice between V1 And V2 And @MM=ItemName
if @PushMoney_ < @PushMoney BEGIN SELECT @MSG=@MSG+' 佣金必需小于' +Convert(NVARCHAR(20),@PushMoney_) END
SELECT @MSG AS msg

declare @User_Auto Int, @Roles Int set @User_Auto = #{userAuto} set @Roles = #{rolesAuto} Begin Declare @Seq Int Select @Seq=isnull(seq,0) From ItemCode Where ItemType=1062 And Num=@Roles
select a.Orders_Auto into #C from Orders a where a.orderstatus > 0 and a.orderstatus < 20 and ( @Roles in(11,30,145) or a.Sales_Auto in ( Select a.User_Auto from AspNet.dbo.aspnet_Users a Join AspNet.dbo.EmpBase b on a.UserName=b.UserName Where Org_Auto in (select a.org_auto from AspNet.dbo.org2EMP a Where a.User_Auto=@User_AUTO and AclType=0) ))
Select distinct a.Orders_Auto,a.OrderType,a.Sales_Auto, n.ItemName AS orderStatusName,b.FName salesname,c.SName,b.DepName, p.Memo nowplace,case when a.Onetime = 1 then '是' else '' end onetimeName ,case when k.MaxLevel <= @Seq then 1 else 0 end auditOK From #C left join Orders(nolock) a on a.Orders_Auto = #C.Orders_Auto inner Join workflowdoc(nolock) k on a.orders_Auto=k.DocPostID And k.Memo='999' and k.Status = 0 and (k.levnow = k.AppSeq or k.AppSeq = k.LevNow +1) Left join v_Emp b on a.Sales_Auto=b.User_Auto Left Join customer(nolock) f on a.TradeItem_Auto=f.TradeItem_Auto LEFT join TradeItem(nolock) c On c.TradeItem_Auto=f.TradeItem_Auto Left Join Brand cc on a.Brand_Auto=cc.Brand_Auto Left Join Clasen dd on dd.Clasen_Auto=a.Clasen_Auto Left Join itemcode p on k.roleid=p.num And p.itemtype=1062 Left join Itemcode n on a.OrderStatus = n.Num and n.ItemType = 327 Where @Seq > k.AppSeq and (k.levnow >=2 or (a.PostType = 4 and k.levnow > -1 and @Roles not in(11,145))) Order By a.Orders_Auto Desc
drop table #C End

declare @UserID BigInt=#{params.userAuto}, @Mode int=#{params.mode}, @SearchWord NvarChar(20)=#{params.searchWord}, @StartDT NvarChar(20)=#{params.startDT}, @EndDT NvarChar(20)=#{params.endDT}, @IsChecked int = 0, @Type int = 8 --[dbo].[s_Orders_N_R] -- @Mode 1报价单号 2客户名称 3业务员 Declare @Orders Table ( Orders_Auto Bigint ) Declare @IsLook int --是否可以查看
Set @IsLook=0
if Exists(select distinct Roles_Auto,RoleName,e.ItemName from AspNet.dbo.aspnet_Users a join AspNet.dbo.aspnet_UsersInRoles b on a.UserId=b.UserId join AspNet.dbo.aspnet_Roles c on b.RoleId=c.RoleId join ItemCode e on c.Roles_Auto=e.Num and e.ItemType=1010 where a.ApplicationId='73663109-dda2-4c2d-8311-337946b5c373' and a.User_Auto=@UserID and e.itemname in('ORDER_ROLES','BUSASS_ROLES' ,'ZHAI_ROLES','ADMIN_ROLES','QIHUA_ROLES') ) begin Set @IsLook=1 end
If @Mode=1 -- 1报价单号 Begin Insert Into @Orders Select Orders_Auto From [Orders] a (NoLock) left join dbo.f_GetEmpList(@UserID) c on @IsLook=0 and c.User_auto=a.Sales_Auto Where Orders_Auto=@SearchWord and (@Type = -1 or (@Type = 0 and a.OrderType != 8) or (@Type = 8 and a.OrderType = 8)) and (@IsLook=1 or c.User_auto is not null) End
If @Mode=2 --2客户名称 Begin Insert Into @Orders Select a.Orders_Auto From [Orders] a (NoLock) inner join TradeItem b (NoLock) on a.TradeItem_Auto=b.TradeItem_Auto left join dbo.f_GetEmpList(@UserID) c on @IsLook=0 and c.User_auto=a.Sales_Auto Where a.CDT between @StartDT and DATEADD(dd,1,@EndDT) and b.FName Like '%'+@SearchWord+'%' and (@Type = -1 or (@Type = 0 and a.OrderType != 8) or (@Type = 8 and a.OrderType = 8)) and (@IsChecked = 0 or (@IsChecked = 1 and a.OrderStatus >= 20)) and (@IsLook=1 or c.User_auto is not null) End
If @Mode=3 --3业务员 Begin Insert Into @Orders Select a.Orders_Auto From [Orders] a (NoLock) inner join v_emp b on a.Sales_Auto=b.User_Auto left join dbo.f_GetEmpList(@UserID) c on @IsLook=0 and c.User_auto=a.Sales_Auto Where a.CDT between @StartDT and DATEADD(dd,1,@EndDT) and b.FName like @SearchWord+'%' and (@Type = -1 or (@Type = 0 and a.OrderType != 8) or (@Type = 8 and a.OrderType = 8)) and (@IsChecked = 0 or (@IsChecked = 1 and a.OrderStatus >= 20)) and (@IsLook=1 or c.User_auto is not null) End
if Exists(Select Orders_Auto From @Orders) Begin
Select t1.SName incName,a.Orders_Auto ,custName=c.SName ,d1.BrandName,d2.ClasenName ,a.MAmt,a.OverAmt,a.DptAmt,a.RentRate ,salesName=isnull(f.fname,17) ,statusName=dbo.f_GetItemName(327,a.OrderStatus) from @Orders b inner join [Orders] a (NoLock) on a.Orders_Auto=b.Orders_Auto inner Join Brand d1 (NoLock) on a.Brand_Auto=d1.Brand_Auto inner Join Clasen d2 (NoLock) On a.Clasen_Auto=d2.Clasen_Auto inner join v_emp f on f.User_auto=a.Sales_Auto Left Join TradeItem c (NoLock) on a.TradeItem_Auto=c.TradeItem_Auto left join Inc t1 (NoLock) on a.Inc_Auto=t1.Inc_Auto Order by a.CDT desc End

select p.Num AS postType, p.ItemName AS postTypeName, a.Orders_Auto,a.Orders_Old,a.MM, a.TradeItem_Auto, c.FName AS fName, b.Org_Auto,b.DepName, b.User_Auto,b.FName AS salesname, g.Num AS custSource ,g.ItemName AS custSourceName, a.PushMan,isnull(a.PushTEL,'') AS pushTel,supplierBuyName = Supplier_Buy.FName, a.CarDT, l.FactoryBrand_Auto,l.FactoryBrandName,j.Brand_Auto,j.BrandName,k.Clasen_Auto,k.ClasenName, a.CarColor, h.Num AS carSource ,h.ItemName AS carSourceName, a.ClasenCode,a.CC,i.Num AS oil,i.ItemName AS oilName,a.MakNo, r.Num AS bsType,r.ItemName AS bsTypeName, d.Inc_Auto AS companyInc,d.SName AS companyIncN, a.IsBigTradeItem, o.Num AS mortgageAddr ,o.ItemName AS mortgageAddrN, (select isnull(convert(decimal(18,0),(sum(FeeAmt))),0) from OrdersFee where Orders_Auto=#{ordersAuto} and FeeType_Auto not in(2,16)) feeAmt, (select isnull(convert(decimal(18,0),(sum(FeeAmt))),0) from OrdersFee where Orders_Auto=#{ordersAuto} and FeeType_Auto in(2)) gpsAmt, (select isnull(convert(decimal(18,0),(sum(InsureRealAmt))),0) from OrdersInsureList where Orders_Auto = #{ordersAuto}) insureRealAmt, convert(decimal(18,0),(a.ListPrice)) as ListPrice, convert(decimal(18,0),(a.DisPrice)) as DisPrice, convert(decimal(18,0),(a.GetPrice)) as GetPrice, isnull(a.CarPriceRef,0) CarPriceRef, convert(decimal(18,0),(a.Accessary)) as Accessary, a.CarTax,a.PushMoney, convert(decimal(18,0),(a.DptAmt)) as DptAmt,a.RentAmt, a.CarExtensionAmt,a.OutFee,a.FinanceFee,a.UrgentFee, a.StampTax, s.Num AS payMode,s.ItemName AS payModeN, a.PayDay, a.RentAmtT,a.GrossMargin,a.Memo, convert(varchar(10),convert(decimal(18,2),(a.IRR)))+'%' as irr, convert(varchar(10),convert(decimal(18,2),(a.GrossMarginT)))+'%' as grossMarginT, isnull(a.A1,'') AS a1,isnull(a.A2,'') AS a2,isnull(a.A3,'') AS a3,isnull(a.A4,'') AS a4,isnull(a.A5,'') AS a5, a.MM2,a.UseKM,a.Weight, m.Num AS insureType,m.ItemName AS insureTypeName, n.Num As insurePercent,n.ItemName As insurePercentName, a.Percnt,isnull(convert(decimal(18,0),a.Discount),0) as Discount, q.Num as car,q.ItemName as carPlace, isnull(a.RateTaxY,0) as rateTaxYear, a.TaxMode, isnull(a.RateRate,0) as rateRate, a.TaxRate AS salesTax, a.rentRate, convert(varchar(10),convert(decimal(18,2),(a.rentRate)))+'%' as rentRateN, convert(decimal(18,2),(a.FinalTax)) as finalTax, f.Num AS orderType ,f.ItemName AS orderTypeName, convert(varchar(10),convert(decimal(18,2),(a.commissionRate)))+'%' as commissionRate, a.MAmt AS rentMAmt ,isnull([dbo].[f_CustomerStatus](a.TradeItem_Auto),'') customerStatus from Orders a left join v_Emp b on a.Sales_Auto = b.User_Auto left join TradeItem(nolock) c On a.TradeItem_Auto = c.TradeItem_Auto left join Inc d on a.Inc_Auto = d.Inc_Auto left join Itemcode g on a.CustSource = g.Num and g.ItemType = 313 left join Itemcode h on a.CarSource = h.Num and h.ItemType = 503 left join Itemcode i on a.oil = i.Num and i.ItemType = 231 left join FactoryBrand l on a.FactoryBrand_Auto = l.FactoryBrand_Auto left join Brand j on a.Brand_Auto = j.Brand_Auto left join Clasen k on a.Clasen_Auto = k.Clasen_Auto left join TradeItem Supplier_Buy (nolock) on a.Supplier_Buy=Supplier_Buy.TradeItem_Auto left join ItemCode r on r.ItemType = 841 and r.Num = a.BsType left join Itemcode m on a.InsureType = m.Num and m.ItemType = 411 left join Itemcode n on a.InsurePercnt = n.Num and n.ItemType = 410 left join ItemCode o on o.itemtype = 135 and o.num = a.MortgageAddr left join Itemcode f on a.OrderType = f.Num and f.ItemType = 326 left join Itemcode p on a.PostType = p.Num and p.ItemType = 413 left join ItemCode q on q.itemtype = 227 and q.num = a.CarPlace left join ItemCode s on s.itemtype = 316 and s.num = a.PayMode where a.Orders_Auto = #{ordersAuto}

--分页查询 declare @Mode int = #{params.mode}, @SearchWord nvarchar(50)=#{params.searchWord}, @PageCount int=#{params.pageNum},--分页总数 @PageSize int =#{params.pageSize},--每页多少条数据 @PageIndex int=#{params.pageIndex}--当前要求的页码索引
BEGIN declare @Count int --记录的总数 declare @min int,@max int
begin select @Count=count(*) from dbo.f_GetSupplier(@Mode,@SearchWord) set @PageCount=(@Count+@PageSize-1)/@PageSize set @min=(@PageIndex-1)*@PageSize+1 set @max=(@PageSize*@PageIndex) select ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY SName collate chinese_PRC_CS_AS_KS_WS) as sno,TradeItem_Auto,SName,IsOpen into #a from dbo.f_GetSupplier(@Mode,@SearchWord) --where IsOpen != '已停用' where TradeItem_Auto != 0 select TradeItem_Auto,SName,IsOpen from #a where sno between @min and @max drop table #a end
END

declare @UserID BigInt=#{params.salesAuto},--业代序号 @SearchWord NvarChar(50)=#{params.searchWord}, @PageCount int=#{params.pageNum},--分页总数 @PageSize int =#{params.pageSize},--每页多少条数据 @PageIndex int=#{params.pageIndex}--当前要求的页码索引 BEGIN declare @Count int --记录的总数 declare @min int,@max int Begin select @Count=count(*) from TradeItem a join Customer b on a.TradeItem_Auto=b.TradeItem_Auto set @PageCount=(@Count+@PageSize-1)/@PageSize set @min=(@PageIndex-1)*@PageSize+1 set @max=(@PageSize*@PageIndex) Select @SearchWord='%'+@SearchWord+'%' Select ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY FName) as sno,a.TradeItem_Auto,a.FName into #a from TradeItem a join Customer b on a.TradeItem_Auto=b.TradeItem_Auto Where a.FName Like @SearchWord and (@UserID = 0 or b.Sales_Auto = @UserID) Order by FName
select TradeItem_Auto,FName from #a where sno between @min and @max drop table #a End End
